attributes.title: 2018 Toyota Corolla Quest 1.6 Auto

attributes.description:
When buying a performance car, one always has to take their wives opinion into account. A delicate balance needs to be achieved in order to get your wife to agree to letting you buy it. This car is the perfect tool for the job. At a glance, its a practical 4 door sedan capable of lugging the kids to and from school with plenty of boot space. Upon closer inspection, lets hope your wife doesn't notice the cracking 6.0 V8 powerplant, or the exaggerated wide arches..

all joking aside, its difficult to find a lumina SS with proper ownership. I've done the hard work for you and managed to find a one owner since new, full service history example. original wheels and the stock exhaust. I cant stress the importance of a car like this having owner since new... as all affordable, older performance cars tend to have passed through multiple owners. This often leads to incomplete service histories, varying driving styles etc.

you have to come and have a look at this car to appreciate the kind of ownership it has had. This example has covered 114000kms since new. Clean, unmolestered examples are fetching close to R500 000. here, I offer you exactly that for R329 000.
attributes.title: 2010 Chevrolet Lumina 6.0 SS Auto
